name: Seeking Asylum: Revelations
description:
Seeking Asylum: Revelations is a Single player/ multiplayer Co-Op video game for the PC. It is 100% free to play and you may enjoy it with your friends at any time. Connect through Discord voice chat and shoot zombies with your friends in this story driven Left for Dead style game.

GAMEPLAY

Character Selection

Choose from a variety of 10+ characters based off The Asylum. Soon to have character abilities and melee weapons

Zombie Hoards

Grab a gun and shoot waves of zombie hoards that get increasingly more difficult

Minigames

in the Extras, there are a bunch of Mini Games you can play like:

Multiplayer Shooting Range
Multiplayer Hover Bike Racing
and more to come soon


GAME MODES

Story Mode

Play through an original storyline written by Nepharius, with different play styles including rescuing NPCs and defeating challenging bosses

Survival Mode

Fight for your life in this game mode while you look for the Directional Jewels. Can you survive?

Extras Mode

Enter the Asylum Headquarters and play a variety of different minigames including a shooting range and a hoverbike race track. Challenge your friends and afterwards Dance in the Nightclub to Asylum original music.
